caption:
🗣️ Raphinha: “Argentina? We’ll beat them up... Absolutely! Beat them up! On the pitch and off the pitch if we have to!” 🇧🇷😤

🗣️ Romario: “Are you going to score a GOAL?” 

🗣️ Raphinha: “YES, For sure, I’m going to (score a goal against Argentina). I’m going in with everything I’ve got...”

🗣️ Romário: “F*ck them?”

🗣️ Raphinha: “F*CK THEM!”

Angel Di Maria has responded to Raphinha’s comments on IG: “😂😂😂

Thoughts? 👇
